hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Ali said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) went out and saw some women sitting, and he said: ‘What are you sitting here for?’ They said: ‘We are waiting for the funeral.’ He said: ‘Are you going to wash the deceased?’ They said: ‘No.’ He said: ‘Are you going to lower him into the grave?’ They said: ‘No.’ He said: ‘Then go back with a burden of sin and not rewarded.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي اتِّبَاعِ النِّسَاءِ الْجَنَائِزَ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning women following the funeral (procession)
